recap_documents.description: ORDER: For the reasons explained in the attached Memorandum and Order, the Court grants Plaintiff's  13  motion for judgment on the pleadings and denies the Commissioner's  17  cross-motion. The Commissioner's decision is remanded purs uant to sentence four of 42 U.S.C. § 405(g) for further consideration consistent with this Memorandum and Order. The Clerk of Court is respectfully directed to enter judgment and close this case. Ordered by Judge Pamela K. Chen on 9/23/2022.  (Mahkamova, Shirin)
